attributes.action: Keep Article 50 and don't remain in the EU.
attributes.additional_details: This is Extremely unfair and is ignoring the high amount of people who voted to have Brexit!
attributes.background: This is a Petition Against staying in the EU and possibly stopping the petition. This is just like a child not getting a sweet and crying to get their own way and the sweet/no Brexit!

rejection.details:
We think that this petition is similar: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/246387
